Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28155 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-28155 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-5, affected by CVE-2023-28155
